body: You can convert to ONNXIFI shape vector with `std::vector<uint64_t>(shape.cbegin(), shape.cend())`
body_html: You can convert to ONNXIFI shape vector with std::vector<uint64_t>(shape.cbegin(), shape.cend())
body_text: You can convert to ONNXIFI shape vector with std::vector<uint64_t>(shape.cbegin(), shape.cend())
